name: ActionCard
desc:
A customizable card-like button with a centered icon,
used for triggering actions like adding a photo.

name: ActionCard
desc: Creates an ActionCard with customizable appearance and behavior.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Background color of the card.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: icon
desc: The icon displayed in the center of the card.

name: iconColor
desc: Color of the icon.

name: iconSize
desc: The size of the icon.

name: onPressed
desc: Callback executed when the icon button is pressed.

name: width
desc: Width of the card.

name: AddDiaryEntryPage
desc: A screen that allows users to add a new diary entry to their travel journal.

name: AddDiaryEntryPage
desc: Creates a page to add a new diary entry.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: dateController
desc: Controller for the date input field.

name: deletePhoto
desc: Callback to delete a specific photo.

name: descriptionController
desc: Controller for the description input field.

name: initialPhotoUrls
desc: List of image paths to prepopulate the photo carousel.

name: isAiGenerated
desc: Whether the description was generated using AI.

name: locationController
desc: Controller for the location input field.

name: onAiGeneratedChanged
desc: Called when the AI-generated state is toggled.

name: onSave
desc: Callback executed after a successful save.

name: switchToCameraScreen
desc: Callback to switch to the camera screen.

name: switchToDiaryScreen
desc: Callback to return to the diary screen.

name: titleController
desc: Controller for the title input field.

name: ErrorDialog
desc: A themed AlertDialog used in the Itinereo app for error or confirmation messages.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: cancelButtonText
desc: Text for the cancel button (default: "Cancel").

name: message
desc: The message to display in the dialog.

name: okButtonText
desc: Text for the OK button (default: "OK").

name: onCancel
desc: Optional callback when pressing Cancel.

name: onOk
desc: Optional callback when pressing OK.

name: showCancelButton
desc: Whether to show a cancel button (default: false).

name: title
desc: Optional title of the dialog.

name: ItinereoAppBar
desc: A custom app bar for the Itinereo app, featuring:

name: ItinereoAppBar
desc: Creates an ItinereoAppBar widget with customizable sections and optional back navigation

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: isBackButtonVisible
desc: Whether to display the back button on the left.

name: onBack
desc: Callback executed when the back button is pressed.

name: pillColor
desc: Background color of the pill containing the title.

name: preferredSize
desc: The size this widget would prefer if it were otherwise unconstrained.

name: showPill
desc: Controls whether the title pill is shown.

name: textColor
desc: Color of the title text inside the pill.

name: title
desc: Main title displayed in the center pill.

name: topBarColor
desc: Color of the top bar section (55px height).

name: BookMark
desc:
A vertical button styled like a bookmark,
displaying an icon followed by a vertical label.

name: BookMark
desc: Creates a BookMark widget.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Background color of the bookmark button.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: icon
desc: Icon displayed above the vertical label.

name: label
desc: Optional text label displayed vertically.

name: onPressed
desc: Callback triggered when the button is pressed.

name: textAndIconColor
desc: Color applied to both icon and text.

name: ItinereoBottomBar
desc: A custom bottom navigation bar used in the Itinereo app.

name: ItinereoBottomBar
desc: Creates an ItinereoBottomBar with the given current index and tap handler.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: currentIndex
desc: Index of the currently selected navigation item.

name: onTap
desc:
Callback triggered when an item is tapped.
Provides the tapped index as parameter.

name: CameraScreen
desc:
A screen that prompts the user to pick an image from the camera or gallery,
and optionally saves it to the device gallery or app cache.

name: CameraScreen
desc: Constructs a CameraScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onBack
desc: Callback triggered when the user presses the back button.

name: onPhotoCaptured
desc:
Callback triggered after an image is successfully captured or selected.
Returns the local path of the saved image.

name: saveToGallery
desc: Whether to save the image to the gallery (true) or to the app's cache (false).

name: saveToAppCache
desc: Saves imageFile to the app's temporary directory.

name: saveToGalleryManually
desc: Saves imageFile to the public gallery folder /Pictures/Itinereo.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: DateField
desc: A custom date selection field based on TextFormField with integrated date picker.

name: DateField
desc: Creates a DateField widget.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: dateController
desc: Controller used to get or set the selected date.

name: DiaryActionButton
desc: A customizable button used for diary-related actions.

name: DiaryActionButton
desc: Creates a DiaryActionButton with the specified properties.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Background color of the button.

name: borderColor
desc: Color of the button border.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: icon
desc: Icon displayed at the start of the button.

name: iconColor
desc: Color of the icon.

name: label
desc: Text label displayed next to the icon.

name: onPressed
desc: Callback executed when the button is tapped.

name: textColor
desc: Color of the text label.

name: DiaryCard
desc:
Represents a summarized version of a diary entry,
typically used for preview cards or lists.

name: DiaryCard
desc: Creates a DiaryCard with the given fields.

name: DiaryCard.fromJson
desc: Creates a DiaryCard from a JSON map.

name: DiaryCard.fromMap
desc: Creates a DiaryCard from a Firestore document map.

name: date
desc: Date and time when the entry was created or refers to.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier of the diary entry.

name: imageUrl
desc: URL of a representative photo associated with the entry.

name: place
desc: Human-readable place name (e.g., city or landmark).

name: title
desc: A short description or summary of the entry.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this model into a JSON map, including the ID.

name: toMap
desc: Converts this model into a map format for saving to Firestore.

name: DiaryEntry
desc: Represents a single personal diary entry.

name: DiaryEntry
desc: Creates a new instance of DiaryEntry.

name: DiaryEntry.fromJson
desc: Creates a DiaryEntry from a JSON map.

name: DiaryEntry.fromMap
desc: Creates a DiaryEntry instance from a given map and document ID.

name: date
desc: Date and time when the entry was created or refers to.

name: description
desc: Detailed description or content of the diary entry.

name: id
desc: Unique identifier for the diary entry.

name: latitude
desc: Latitude coordinate of the entry location.

name: location
desc: Human-readable name of the location (e.g., city or place name).

name: longitude
desc: Longitude coordinate of the entry location.

name: photoUrls
desc: List of photo URLs associated with the entry.

name: title
desc: Title of the diary entry.

name: toJson
desc: Converts the entry to a JSON-compatible map, including the document ID.

name: toMap
desc: Converts the entry to a map format, useful for saving into Firestore.

name: DiaryPreview
desc: A screen that previews the user's diary entries in a scrollable list.

name: DiaryPreview
desc: Constructs the DiaryPreview screen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onBack
desc: Optional callback for the back button in the app bar.

name: onBottomTap
desc: Callback to handle bottom navigation interactions.

name: onViewPage
desc: Callback triggered when a diary entry is selected.

name: DiaryScreen
desc: A welcome screen for the diary section of the app.

name: DiaryScreen
desc: Creates a DiaryScreen with navigation callbacks.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: switchToAddDiaryPage
desc: Callback that navigates to the screen for adding a new diary entry.

name: switchToHome
desc: Callback that navigates back to the home screen.

name: switchToMapPage
desc: Callback that navigates to the map view screen.

name: switchToPreview
desc: Callback that navigates to the diary preview screen.

name: DiaryService
desc: Service responsible for managing diary entries in Firestore and local SQLite.

name: DiaryService
desc: Factory constructor to access the singleton instance.

name: DiaryService.test
desc: Constructor used for unit testing with injected dependencies.

name: addEntry
desc: Adds a diary entry to Firestore under the current user's collection.

name: deleteEntry
desc: Deletes a diary entry from both Firestore and local storage.

name: fetchMoreDiaryEntries
desc: Loads more diary entries in paginated form from Firestore.

name: getDiaryCards
desc: Retrieves a paginated list of diary cards from Firestore.

name: getEntryById
desc: Returns a full diary entry by ID, from Firestore or local DB if offline.

name: requestStoragePermission
desc: Requests storage permission required for accessing photos.

name: syncLocalEntriesWithFirestore
desc: Syncs the latest 10 remote entries to local storage on first login.

name: ExploreScreen
desc:
A screen that lets users explore nearby attractions by category,
such as museums, libraries, or parks.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onBottomTap
desc: Callback to handle bottom navigation bar taps.

name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
desc: Default FirebaseOptions for use with your Firebase apps.

name: StorageService
desc: A service class for managing photo uploads to Firebase Storage.

name: uploadPhoto
desc: Uploads an image file to Firebase Storage and returns its public URL.

name: userId
desc: The currently authenticated user's UID.

name: ForgetPasswordScreen
desc: A screen that allows users to request a password reset via email.

name: ForgetPasswordScreen
desc: Creates the ForgetPasswordScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: DiaryEntryDetailPage
desc: A screen that displays detailed information for a specific diary entry.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: entryId
desc: The unique ID of the diary entry to be displayed.

name: onBack
desc: Callback to navigate back from the detail view.

name: GoogleService
desc: A service class responsible for handling Google Sign-In authentication.

name: generateDescriptionFromEntry
desc: Generates a diary description using the Gemini API from a DiaryEntry.

name: generateItinerariesFromEntries
desc: Generates 5 suggested itineraries based on a list of DiaryEntry objects.

name: loginWithGoogle
desc: Signs in the user using Google Sign-In and Firebase Authentication.

name: HomeScreen
desc: The main home screen of the Itinerèo app.

name: HomeScreen
desc: Creates a HomeScreen widget.

name: cachedItineraries
desc: A cached list of itineraries to prevent recomputation.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onBottomTap
desc: Callback to handle bottom navigation taps.

name: setCachedItineraries
desc: Setter to update the cached itineraries in the parent state.

name: switchToCustomMap
desc: Callback to navigate to a custom map view with markers and optional polyline.

name: switchToDetailPage
desc: Callback to navigate to the detail view of a diary entry.

name: HorizontalDiaryCard
desc:
A horizontally oriented diary preview card displaying an image,
date, location, title, and a call-to-action button.

name: HorizontalDiaryCard
desc: Creates a HorizontalDiaryCard with the given diary content.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: diaryCard
desc: Diary data source containing date, image path, location and title.

name: onViewPage
desc: Callback executed when the user taps the "View page" button.

name: CustomTextFormField
desc:
A customizable and reusable TextFormField widget with enhanced styling,
built-in multiline support, optional validation, and rich text formatting.

name: CustomTextFormField
desc: Creates a CustomTextFormField with extended customization and formatting options.

name: border
desc: Border for all states (enabled, focused, etc.). If not provided, uses a default rounded border.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: capitalization
desc: Controls capitalization behavior (e.g., sentences, words, characters).

name: contentPadding
desc: Internal padding inside the input field. Defaults to vertical spacing.

name: controller
desc: Controls the text being edited.

name: fillColor
desc: Background color of the input field. Defaults to a soft cream tone.

name: hintStyle
desc: Custom style for the hint text. If not provided, uses default font.

name: hintText
desc: Hint text displayed when the input is empty.

name: inputFormatters
desc: Input formatters to apply (e.g., filtering digits, uppercasing).

name: maxLines
desc: Maximum number of lines allowed when multiline is true.

name: minLines
desc: Minimum number of lines to occupy when multiline is true.

name: multiline
desc: Enables multi-line input when set to true.

name: onChanged
desc: Callback triggered when the text is changed.

name: readOnly
desc: Disables editing if set to true.

name: textAlign
desc: Defines the alignment of the entered text (e.g., start, center).

name: textStyle
desc: Custom style for the input text. If not provided, uses default font.

name: validator
desc: Validation logic to be applied to the field value.

name: ItineraryCard
desc:
A card widget that displays a static preview of a location on a map,
along with a title and a "Map" button to trigger a full map view.

name: ItineraryCard
desc: Creates an ItineraryCard that shows a preview of a destination on the map

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: buildStaticMapUrl
desc: Builds a Google Static Maps URL for the given latitude and longitude.

name: markers
desc:
List of Markers used to determine the static map preview location.
Only the first marker is used for rendering the image.

name: onTap
desc: Callback function executed when the "Map" button is pressed.

name: title
desc: Title shown at the bottom of the card.

name: ItinereoManager
desc: The main app controller and router after login.

name: ItinereoManager
desc: Creates the ItinereoManager.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: LoadingButton
desc: A reusable button widget for the Itinereo app, with built-in loading state.

name: LoadingButton
desc: Creates a LoadingButton with a label and optional loading indicator.

name: btnText
desc: The text label displayed inside the button when not loading.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: isLoading
desc: Whether the button should display a loading spinner instead of text.

name: onPress
desc: Callback triggered when the button is tapped.

name: LoadingDialog
desc: A custom modal dialog that displays a loading spinner with a message.

name: LoadingDialog
desc: Creates a LoadingDialog with a centered message and a spinner.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: message
desc: Message displayed next to the loading indicator.

name: LocalDiaryDatabase
desc: A local SQLite-backed database for storing DiaryEntry and DiaryCard data.

name: LocalDiaryDatabase
desc: Creates a LocalDiaryDatabase instance.

name: database
desc: Returns the active Database instance, initializing it if needed.

name: deleteEntry
desc: Deletes a diary entry by its id.

name: getAllEntries
desc: Retrieves all DiaryEntrys for a given user, ordered by most recent date.

name: getDiaryCardsFromLocalDb
desc: Retrieves a paginated list of DiaryCards for preview display.

name: getEntryById
desc: Returns a specific DiaryEntry by its id, or null if not found.

name: insertEntry
desc: Inserts a DiaryEntry into the local database for a specific user.

name: maxEntries
desc: Maximum number of entries to store per user.

name: LocationException
desc: Base class for all location-related exceptions.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: LocationPermissionDeniedException
desc: Exception thrown when location permissions are denied.

name: LocationPermissionPermanentlyDeniedException
desc: Exception thrown when location permissions are permanently denied.

name: LocationServicesDisabledException
desc: Exception thrown when location services are disabled.

name: PlacesApiException
desc: Exception thrown when using Places API by Google Maps.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: GeolocatorService
desc: A service for handling geolocation and location-based data retrieval.

name: getCityAndCountryFromPosition
desc:
Returns a human-readable string containing the city and country
from the provided Position using the Google Geocoding API.

name: getCurrentLocation
desc: Retrieves the user's current GPS position.

name: getNearbyPlacesMap
desc: Retrieves nearby places from the Google Places API and returns a CustomMapPage.

name: LogInChecker

desc: Creates the LogInChecker widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: LoginScreen
desc: Creates the LoginScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: main
desc: Entry point of the Itinereo app.

desc: Creates the DiaryMapPage with optional onBack and onEntrySelected handlers.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onBack
desc: Callback triggered when the back button is pressed.

name: onEntrySelected
desc: Callback triggered when a marker corresponding to an entry is tapped.

name: PhotoCarousel
desc: A custom horizontal photo carousel used in the Itinereo app.

desc: Creates a PhotoCarousel with a list of photos and optional trailing action.

name: actionCard
desc: An optional card (e.g., action button) displayed at the end of the carousel.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: caption
desc: Optional caption shown below the photo carousel.

name: controller
desc: Page controller for managing swipes and page transitions.

name: maxPhotos
desc: Maximum number of photos allowed before hiding the actionCard.

name: photoUrls
desc: List of image paths or URLs to display in the carousel.

name: PolaroidPhoto
desc:
A styled photo container inspired by polaroid photography,
supporting local, network, and asset images.

name: PolaroidPhoto
desc: Creates a PolaroidPhoto widget with customizable presentation.

name: angle
desc: Rotation angle in radians (e.g., 0.1 for slight tilt).

name: backgroundColor
desc: Background color of the polaroid frame and the border.

name: borderWidth
desc: Width of the border around the image.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: imagePath
desc: Path to the image. Can be a local file path, asset name, or network URL.

name: isAsset
desc: Whether the image is an asset. Set to true for bundled assets.

name: showShadow
desc: Whether to show a soft drop shadow below the photo.

name: width
desc: Optional width of the widget. Defaults to 35% of screen width.

name: RecentDiaryCardsBox
desc: A scrollable horizontal section that displays the most recent diary entries.

desc: Creates a RecentDiaryCardsBox showing a list of recent diary entries.

desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: cards

name: onRefresh

desc:
Callback triggered when a diary card is tapped.
Receives the entry's id as parameter.

name: SafeLocalImage

desc:
Creates a SafeLocalImage widget that attempts to load a local image
and handles missing files or permission issues.

name: borderRadius
desc: Border radius for rounding the image or placeholder container.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: fit
desc: Defines how the image should be inscribed into the space allocated.

name: height
desc: Optional fixed height for the image or placeholder.

name: icon
desc: Optional icon to display next to the placeholder message.

name: path
desc: Full file path to the image on local storage.

name: placeholderText
desc: Optional placeholder message when the file is not found.

name: showSettingsButton
desc: Whether to show a "Go to Settings" button when permissions are denied.

name: textStyle
desc: Custom text style for placeholder messages.

name: verticalLayout
desc: Whether to display the placeholder layout vertically (column) or horizontally (row).

name: width
desc: Optional fixed width for the image or placeholder.

name: SignInException

A utility class for displaying custom-styled SnackBars

Displays a floating SnackBar with the given message and Itinereo styling.
context is the build context used to access the ScaffoldMessenger.
message is the text content to be displayed in the SnackBar.
